Uses of Class
filesystem.FileSystemItem

  • Packages that use FileSystemItem 
    Package Description
    filesystem  

    • Uses of FileSystemItem in filesystem

      Subclasses of FileSystemItem in filesystem 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Directory
      This class implements the behavior of concrete directories.
      class  File
      This class implements the behavior of concrete files.
      Methods in filesystem that return FileSystemItem 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileSystemItem Drive.getItemFromPath(String givenItemPath)
      Returns the object of a given path name.
      Methods in filesystem that return types with arguments of type FileSystemItem 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract ArrayList<FileSystemItem> FileSystemItem.getContent()
      Returns the content of the item.
      ArrayList<FileSystemItem> File.getContent()
      null is returned since a files does not contain any subitems.
      ArrayList<FileSystemItem> Directory.getContent()
      An array list with the content of this directory (files and subdirectories) is returned.
      Methods in filesystem with parameters of type FileSystemItem 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Directory.remove(FileSystemItem item)
      Removes a directory or a file from current directory.
